text: Cryptorhynchus is a genus of hidden snout weevils in the beetle family Curculionidae. There are at least 480 described species in Cryptorhynchus. ==Gallery== Image:Cryptorhynchus lapathi, rostral furrow with mesosternal receptacle.tif|Cryptorhynchus lapathi; rostral furrow with mesoventral receptacle (MR), the diagnostic character of the Cryptorhynchinae sensu stricto ==See also== * List of Cryptorhynchus species ==References== == External links == * * * Category:Cryptorhynchinae Category:Curculionidae genera
title: Cryptorhynchus
